data.name: #tacticalunderground arcade
data.detailed_description:
BASED ON REAL EVENTS!
The #tacticalunderground series of tactical shooting tournaments is now available as a PC game!
In the #tacticalunderground arcade you will find a huge number of shooting tournaments. Day and night, in closed shooting ranges or on huge training grounds, take part in matches in sports and tactical disciplines. Try your hand at the #tacticalunderground series.

GENRE FOR ANY TASTE!
The main idea of ​​the game is to make a game for everyone! Gradually, with the release of updates, the boundaries of the game will expand.
#tacticalunderground arcade - a collection of games of various genres in the shooting sports setting:
Top-Down Shooter - Chapter "Unlimited".
First Person Shooter - Update 2022.
Third Person Shooter - Update 2022.
Each key update will always be free for those who bought the game!
In the game, you will have the opportunity to choose the complexity and duration of campaigns for yourself: from casual (for those who want to occupy themselves in their free time) to hardcore (modes with the expectation of full immersion in the game).

PLAY WITH FRIENDS
Play campaigns in co-op mode, or fight in competitive modes.
Play locally or online with Steam - Remote Play Together!

data.short_description: Welcome to the world of shooting sports! There are tons of shooting tournaments waiting for you in the #tacticalunderground arcade! Day and night, in closed shooting ranges or on huge training grounds, take part in matches in sports and tactical disciplines.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4200M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 740M
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 8750H
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4200M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 740M
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 8750H
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
